answers.answer: Patients can benefit from services in the basic dental medicine package, which include consultation, treatment of simple caries, oral mucosa conditions, dental extractions, alveolar curettage, hemorrhage treatment, decapsulation, removable acrylic prosthesis, physiognomic or semi-physiognomic prosthetic elements, and devices for congenital malformations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Refugees can access dental care through services provided in the basic dental medicine package, with costs covered by health insurance companies based on age and specific conditions. A list of dentists working with the National Insurance House is also available.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Eligibility covers all ages, with 100% coverage for ages 0-18 years. For those over 18, coverage varies, but young people aged 18-26 who are students, apprentices, or do not earn income, and individuals benefiting from special conditions (laws), may receive 100% coverage.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: For people over 18 years old, dental services are covered at a percentage varying between 60% and 100%, depending on the type of service.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Students aged 18-26, including high school graduates until the academic year starts (not more than 3 months), and apprentices, receive 100% coverage if they do not earn income from work.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The basic package includes consultation, treatment of simple caries, oral mucosa conditions, dental extractions, alveolar curettage and hemorrhage treatment, decapsulation, removable acrylic prosthesis, physiognomic or semi-physiognomic prosthetic elements, and devices for congenital malformations.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The National Health Insurance House supports dental care by providing information through a guide on rights in the social health insurance system and by working with dentists whose services are covered by health insurance companies.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: A list of dentists working with the National Insurance House can be viewed directly on the website.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the section under 'List of dentists working with the National Insurance House'.

answers.answer: The guide contains information regarding the rights of people from the armed conflict zone in Ukraine within the social health insurance system, which includes details about dental services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: For people who benefit from special conditions or laws, health insurance companies pay 100% of the fees related to some of the dental services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dentist and read the page carefully.
